benchmark_details.name: Medical Triage Alignment Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: A novel medical triage decision-making dataset containing various scenarios labeled with Decision-Maker Attributes (DMAs) that influence human judgments.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To quantify model alignment using a new attribute-dependent accuracy metric and to demonstrate LLMs as ethical decision-makers in medical triage.

data.source: Custom-written scenarios by cognitive scientists to elicit responses for various DMAs.
data.annotation: Labeled by scenario authors and reviewed by at least one other researcher.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy measures the selection of the correct choice(s), conditioned on a target attribute value (high or low).
methodology.interpretation: High alignment accuracy indicates better alignment of LLM decisions to specified DMAs.
